short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Assistant for boosting LinkedIn Engagement.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An AI-powered Assistant for LinkedIn engagement. 
Prattl features:
- Generate intelligent suggested comments for LinkedIn Posts
- Generate engaging suggested replies for LinkedIn Comments
- Generate insightful contributions for LinkedIn Collaborative Articles (and the coveted Top Voice badge!)
